orthorectification.title: Orthorectification quality
orthorectification.description: To what model quality orthorectification was achieved (either 'systemic' or 'precision'). Any detector which failed precision refinement will result in a fallback to 'systematic'.

points.title: L1C geometric pointing metrics
points.description: Metrics describing how the image location was adjusted from raw to processed, listed by sensor ID.

location.title: Image coordinate location
location.description: The location in the image where the metrics are applicable to. The possible locations are: upper-left corner, lower-left corner, lower-right corner, upper-right corner, and scene center.

precisionLocation.title: Precision corrected coordinate
precisionLocation.description: The precision corrected coordinate in (longitude, latitude).

rawLocation.title: Raw coordinate
rawLocation.description: Raw location in (longitude, latitude) prior to any corrections being applied.

rawToPrecisionDisparityMeter.title: Raw to precision coordinate difference
rawToPrecisionDisparityMeter.description: The difference in meters between the raw and precision coordinate locations.

rawToSystematicDisparityMeter.title: Raw to systematic coordinate difference
rawToSystematicDisparityMeter.description: The difference in meters between the raw and systematic coordinate locations.

systematicLocation.title: Systematically corrected coordinate
systematicLocation.description: The systematically corrected coordinate in (longitude, latitude).

systematicToPrecisionDisparityMeter.title: Systematic to precision coordinate difference
systematicToPrecisionDisparityMeter.description: The difference in meters between the systematic and precision coordinate locations.
